name: obsidian-livesync
description: obsidian-livesync is a self-hosted sync server for Obsidian vaults, enabling real-time collaboration across devices without cloud services. It supports encryption and conflict resolution.
features: Real-time sync: Keep Obsidian vaults synchronized across desktop and mobile devices with automatic change detection.
End-to-end encryption: Protect note content with client-side encryption before transmission to the sync server.
Conflict resolution: Detect and merge conflicting edits when the same note is modified on multiple devices simultaneously.
Self-hosted control: Run your own sync server to maintain complete ownership of note data without cloud dependencies.
Version history: Access previous versions of notes to recover deleted content or review document evolution.
Selective sync: Choose which folders or files to synchronize per device for managing large vaults efficiently.
Plugin compatibility: Work alongside other Obsidian plugins without interfering with community extensions or themes.
Offline support: Continue editing notes without connection and sync changes automatically when network is restored.
